sentences.sentence: "What does that matter," said the cat, "it is no worse than Crumb-stealer, as your godchildren are called."
sentences.translation: “那有什么关系，”猫说，“没有比你的教子叫什么‘偷面包屑的’更糟吧。”

sentences.sentence: When I was your teacher, I was something of a dream stealer.
sentences.translation: 当我是你的老师的时候，我是个不折不扣的偷梦人。

sentences.sentence: You can punish a stealer but whose nature was hard to change.
sentences.translation: 你可以惩罚一个小偷，但他本性难改。（江山易改，本性难移。）
